modName: Krent Mansion - A Dwemer Themed Player Home
summary:
*This is mod does reqire a pretty good computer*
This is a player house mod with a dwemer theme to it, its located right next to the western towers of Whiterun, Whiterun plains.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][/size][/b][/center][left][size=5][b]Krent Mansion
[/b][/size][size=3]Like said above this is a Dwemer themed player home. nothing much more to it than that exept that it looks good (in my opinion). [/size]

[size=3]This home offers:[/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Storage for all your stuff[/size]
[*][size=3]Bed[/size]
[*][size=3]Lounge[/size]
[*][size=3]Enchanting and alchemy table[/size]
[*][size=3]Armory[/size]
[*][size=3]Pool[/size]
[*][size=3]Mead and wine storage[/size]
[*][size=3]Kitchen[/size]
[*][size=3]Smithing stuff[/size]
[*][size=3]Two librarys[/size]
[*][size=3]Lots of plants and foliage[/size]
[*][size=3]Display cases[/size]
[*][size=3]Linked containers[/size]
[/list]
[size=3]I dont realy have much more to say than it has been fun to make this, its nothing profesionall![/size]
[size=4]Feel free to endorse!
[/size]More info in readme!






[/left]
author: roguefreeman
